title: The land of Suvorov (Soviet poster, 1944)
Text: The land of Suvorov. The area around the Dnieper and the banks of the Danube are radiant with the glory of Suvorovâ€™s victories. Where our grandfathers were victorious in battle, again the Russian knight has earned soldierly glory. And Suvorov, proud of our victory, congratulates his valiant grandsons.
Additional Information: Shows a Red Army soldier saluting the eighteenth century Russian General and military hero Alexander Suvorov.
